com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web

Class SCUIWebValidationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web.SCUIWebValidationUtils

  • public class SCUIWebValidationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for request validation framework. This class also provides getter for various switches based on context parameters. asmishra

      • getDefaultApplicationId

      • isURIPatternInContextParam

        public static boolean isURIPatternInContextParam(java.lang.String uri,
                                                 java.lang.String key,
                                                 javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        This method reads context parameter with name as [key], [key]-endswith, [key]-regex and matches them with the passed URI, and returns true if any match was found.
        Note: uri given as param should not have context path in it. uri uri to be looked for in context parameter value. Should not contain context path. key key identifier for which URI would be matched. servletContext true if uri pattern matches context param

      • isURIPatternInContextParam

        public static boolean isURIPatternInContextParam(java.lang.String key,
                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method reads context parameter with name as [key], [key]-endswith, [key]-regex and matches them with the current URI, and returns true if any match was found. key key identifier for which URI would be matched. request true if uri pattern matches context param

      • initURIPatternsMap

        public static void initURIPatternsMap(java.lang.String key,
                                      javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        This method initialized URI patterns defined as servlet context for the passed key. key servletContext

      • getURIPatternsMap

        public static java.util.HashMap getURIPatternsMap(java.lang.String key,
                                                  javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Returns map of all the URI patterns found in context parameter for passed key. key servletContext URIPatternsMap

      • getApplicationID

        public static java.lang.String getApplicationID(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Returns the application id defined in context parameter. Method looks for a context parameter with name SCUIWebValidationConstants#APPLICATION_ID_CONTEXTPARAM_NAME to determine application id. context application id

      • addValidaitonErrorToRequest

        public static void addValidaitonErrorToRequest(SCUIRequestValidationException e,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Adds the SCUIRequestValidationException exception to error list on request context.

        The same error list can be fetched by #getValidaionErrorList(HttpServletRequest) method. e request #shouldThrowValidationException(ServletContext)

      • getValidaionErrorList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<SCUIRequestValidationException> getValidaionErrorList(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns error list from request context. Exceptions to this list are added whenever an invalid request input is encountered. request error list #shouldThrowValidationException(ServletContext)

      • shouldThrowValidationException

        public static boolean shouldThrowValidationException(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Reads context parameter for name SCUIWebValidationConstants#SUPPRESS_VALIDAITON_EXCEPTION_CONTEXTPARAM_NAME context true if validation exception needs to be caught and save to a list in request context

      • handleValidationException

        public static void handleValidationException(SCValidationException e,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method takes care of handling a SCValidationException which is thrown from SCValidator. Exception is converted to SCUIRequestValidationException and then based on SCUIWebValidationConstants#SUPPRESS_VALIDAITON_EXCEPTION_CONTEXTPARAM_NAME context parameter, either the new exception is thrown or added to error list. e request #shouldThrowValidationException(ServletContext) #getValidaionErrorList(HttpServletRequest) #addValidaitonErrorToRequest(SCUIRequestValidationException, HttpServletRequest)

      • handleValidationException

        public static void handleValidationException(SCValidationException e,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                             java.lang.String inputName)
        This method takes care of handling a SCValidationException which is thrown from SCValidator. Exception is converted to SCUIRequestValidationException and then based on SCUIWebValidationConstants#SUPPRESS_VALIDAITON_EXCEPTION_CONTEXTPARAM_NAME context parameter, either the new exception is thrown or added to error list. e request inputName name of input which caused the error. Useful to show the error on UI. #shouldThrowValidationException(ServletContext) #getValidaionErrorList(HttpServletRequest) #addValidaitonErrorToRequest(SCUIRequestValidationException, HttpServletRequest)

      • suppressRequestValidation

        public static boolean suppressRequestValidation(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Returns true if request validation is turned off. This method reads context parameter SCUIWebValidationConstants#SUPPRESS_REQUEST_VALIDATION_CONTEXTPARAM_NAME . context true if request validation needs to be suppressed

      • bypassRequestValidation

        public static boolean bypassRequestValidation(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns true if request validation is turned off entirely, if the uiExtensibilityMode is on or if the particular request URL is in the bypass list.

        Note that this method uses request URL (not URI) to verify the bypass list.

        request true if no validation should be done on the request.

      • getUnsafeRequest

        public static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest getUnsafeRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns unsafe request object. No validation will occur if methods are called on this unsafe request. request unsafe request

      • getJSONDataValidationRepresentation

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer getJSONDataValidationRepresentation(java.lang.String inputName,
                                                                         java.lang.String inputType,
                                                                         java.lang.String applicationId)

      • getServletContext

        public static javax.servlet.ServletContext getServletContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Invokes HttpServletRequest.getServletContext

        Done via reflection for now due to compile-time dependencies on an older jar. If the method cannot be found (an old servlet spec), then it will be retrieved from the Session, which it will create if needed.
